message.content: cs.EMBD, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.ET - The paper proposes a methodology for fault injection in HDL code, which is commonly used in embedded systems (cs.EMBD) and hardware design (cs.AR). The focus is on evaluating safety mechanisms, which is a topic in software engineering (cs.SE) and system design (cs.SY). The proposed technique involves optimizing the fault injection locations, which is related to optimization and testing (cs.ET).
